displayName.spanish: Cayendo por la madriguera del conejo

description.english: Mine your first block
description.russian: Добудь свой первый блок.
description.brazilian: Minere seu primeiro bloco
description.french: Détruire votre premier bloc.
description.spanish: Rompe tu primer bloque

description.english: Build your first block
description.russian: Создай свой первый блок.
description.brazilian: Construa seu primeiro bloco
description.french: Construire votre premier bloc.
description.spanish: Construye tu primer bloque

description.english: Get your first online kill
description.french: Faire votre première victime en ligne.
description.spanish: Mata a tu primera víctima
description.russian: Убей врага в сетевой игре.
description.brazilian: Faça sua primeira vítima on-line

displayName.spanish: El dulce sabor de la victoria

description.english: Win an online match
description.french: Remporter une partie en ligne.
description.spanish: Gana una partida
description.russian: Выиграй сетевой бой.
description.brazilian: Ganhe uma partida on-line

description.english: Set a title, icon and border
description.russian: Выбери звание, значок и рамку.
description.german: Wähl deinen Titel, Rahmen und dein Abzeichen aus.
description.brazilian: Escolha um título, ícone e borda
description.french: Appliquer un titre, un insigne, et une bordure.
description.spanish: Elige un título, un ícono y un borde

description.english: Use a hero's active ability
description.russian: Задействуй активную способность героя.
description.german: Benutz die aktive Fähigkeit eines Helden.
description.brazilian: Use a habilidade ativa de um herói
description.french: Utiliser la capacité active d'un héros.
description.spanish: Usa la destreza activa de un personaje

description.english: Level up your first Hero
description.german: Erreiche mit deinem ersten Helden eine höhere Stufe.
description.french: Gagner un niveau avec votre premier héros.
description.spanish: Aumenta el nivel de tu primer personaje
description.russian: Повысь уровень своего первого героя
description.brazilian: Subir o nível do seu primeiro Herói

displayName.spanish: El aún más dulce sabor de la victoria

description.english: Win 10 online matches
description.russian: Выиграй 10 сетевых боев.
description.brazilian: Ganhe 10 partidas on-line
description.french: Remporter 10 parties en ligne.
description.spanish: Gana 10 partidas

description.english: Win 100 online matches
description.russian: Выиграй 100 сетевых боев.
description.brazilian: Ganhe 100 partidas on-line
description.french: Remporter 100 parties en ligne.
description.spanish: Gana 100 partidas

description.english: Travel 10000 units
description.russian: Пройди 10 000 шагов.
description.brazilian: Viaje por 10000 unidades
description.french: Parcourir une distance de 10 000 blocs.
description.spanish: Desplázate a lo largo de 10.000 bloques

description.english: Defeat 1000 enemies
description.russian: Убей 1000 врагов.
description.brazilian: Derrote 1000 inimigos
description.french: Éliminer 1 000 ennemis.
description.spanish: Derrota a 1.000 enemigos

description.english: Perform 1000 critical hits
description.russian: Нанеси врагу 1000 критических ударов.
description.brazilian: Realize 1000 acertos críticos
description.french: Infliger 1 000 coups critiques.
description.spanish: Efectúa 1.000 golpes críticos

description.english: Mine 1000 blocks
description.russian: Добудь 1000 блоков.
description.brazilian: Minere 1000 blocos
description.french: Détruire 1 000 blocs.
description.spanish: Rompe 1.000 bloques

description.english: Accumulate 1000000 units of resources
description.russian: Собери 1 000 000 ед. ресурсов.
description.brazilian: Acumule 1000000 unidades de recursos
description.french: Rassembler 1 000 000 unités de ressources.
description.spanish: Acumula un millón de cubos

description.english: Kill 100 enemies while you are below 30% hit points
description.russian: Убей 100 врагов, когда у тебя останется 30% здоровья.
description.german: Töte 100 Gegner, während du weniger als 30 % Gesundheit hast.
description.brazilian: Mate 100 inimigos quando tiver menos de 30% de pontos de vida
description.french: Tuer 100 ennemis en ayant moins de 30 % de points de vie restants.
description.spanish: Mata 100 enemigos mientras tienes menos del 30% de salud

description.english: Kill 3 enemies in 10 seconds
description.russian: Убей 3 врагов за 10 секунд.
description.brazilian: Mate 3 inimigos em 10 segundos
description.french: Tuer 3 ennemis en moins de 10 secondes.
description.spanish: Mata 3 enemigos en 10 segundos

description.english: Accumulate 10000 resources in a single match
description.russian: Собери 10 000 ед. ресурсов в одном сражении.
description.brazilian: Acumule 10000 recursos em uma única partida
description.french: Récupérer 10 000 ressources en une seule partie.
description.spanish: Acumula 10.000 cubos en una sola partida

displayName.french: C'est en forgeant qu'on devient forgeron

description.english: Destroy the enemy base in Practice Grounds.
description.german: Zerstöre die gegnerische Basis auf den Übungsgeländen.
description.french: Détruire la base ennemie du terrain d'entraînement.
description.spanish: Destruye el núcleo enemigo dentro del tutorial
description.russian: Уничтожь вражескую базу на учебной площадке.
description.brazilian: Destrua a base inimiga na Área de Treinamento.

description.english: Collect all tokens in Practice Grounds.
description.german: Sammle alle Marken auf den Übungsgeländen.
description.french: Récupérer tous les jetons du terrain d'entraînement.
description.spanish: Junta todas las recompensas del tutorial
description.russian: Собери все жетоны на учебной площадке.
description.brazilian: Recolha todas as fichas na Área de Treinamento.
